1.0.name: wordpress/g-social-share
1.0.description:
Simple as it may seem but this plugin is pretty useful in increasing your blog traffic. Have you heard about viral traffic? Just place these buttons wherever you think your blog readers are most engaged with your content & increase your traffic virally in no time. Use it to believe it.

For any help, visit http://www.i5ws.com/johnthedeveloper
